Project.Brief history of your project and organi: We leverage our parent company's expertise in computer hardware and software infrastructure design to establish ourselves as a leading provider of professional computer technology services, a manufacturer of blockchain products, and a distributor of electronic commercial display solutions. We are actively engaged in blockchain technology research and employ cutting-edge methods to integrate blockchain computing into devices like smart homes and HVAC equipment. By harnessing the power of idle devices through specialized computing modules, we enhance our computational capabilities while keeping costs minimal. Furthermore, we offer remote monitoring software for these blockchain devices, ensuring a secure and efficient control system. Our philosophy is rooted in professionalism and excellence, evident in our diverse range of intelligent commercial display products and integrated solutions that cater to the TV and surveillance industries.
